title: An unexpected error has occurred while displaying Ready Check.
body: For the last few days I've been trying to play, but a message pops us saying "An unexpected error has occurred while displaying Ready Check". When I click **ACCEPT** the ready check says **MATCH ACCEPTED** and it stays like that until the error pops up. How do I fix it?

replies.body: This might have been some kind of hiccup between the client and your network. It sounds like the client is only having problems once it needs to transition you to the champion select lobby, so let's see if we can smooth out that process. Go through our [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and make sure to flush your DNS as well as the other steps listed. Let me know if that's able to help or not.
